function RIR_EP05_05()
    -- .起-4【1月第2週】「筆頭騎士・鬼灯リラ」
    SaveData.Title = "筆頭騎士・鬼灯リラ"

    -- //BG：男子部教室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ Since it was decided that I would participate in the Princess Election, the days have been a whirlwind.]])

    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）、オウガ（通常）、１号（通常）、２号（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MA101aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA201aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,300,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1115.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Serious "So, just like during the Princess Election with Senior Daria, I want everyone in the boys' division to make posters and videos for Erika."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0321.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Smiling "Miss Erika is really making a bold move again."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MA101ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0100.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Excited "The boys' division will lend what little help we can! Although, I hear Senpai #3 is taking a break for a while due to family reasons..."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA201ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0073.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Excited "We can't make a video like last time, so this time I shall make a statue of Lady Erika! Therefore, I request to borrow some clothes to see the nude form!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1596.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Blushing "Eek!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    LAYER_EFFECT(65,6,30,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1116.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Serious "W-w-whoa! Who do you think you're touching?!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA201ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0074.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Panicked "Gyaaaaaaaahhh!?!?"]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san reacted faster than I did and threw Senpai #2, who was advancing on me, flying away.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（驚き）、オウガ（通常）、１号（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA101ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Everyone gathered from the boys' division looked wide-eyed at her lightning-fast reaction.]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0101.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Panicked "Senpai #2!? I'm supposed to be the one dishing out physical punishment, you cheater!?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0394.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Surprised "She was even faster than my Berserker Mode!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0322.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "That's rare, Hoozuki. Usually you like to join in on the mischief too."]])

    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑・汗）
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1117.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Nervous smile/sweat "R-really? I just can't stand sexual harassment, that's all, you know?"]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san laughed, trying to brush it off.]])

    MSG([[ I understood. She was protecting me so my cross-dressing wouldn't be exposed.]])

    MSG([[ But to someone who didn’t know the situation, it might have seemed like an overreaction.]])

    MSG([[ This relationship where only two people knew the truth felt a bit awkward.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：メインストリート（昼）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ One morning.]])

    MSG([[ The whole Erika faction arrived early at school, handing out flyers asking each student to vote for Erika and me.]])

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｄ×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0034.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ione Heiwado】 "Fwaa~... I'm so sleepy... Do these flyers even work?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0030.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Jasuko Heiwado】 "Under-the-table work suits us sisters better, you know~"]])

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒Ｄ×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1118.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Smiling "It's not just the flyers, meeting face-to-face in the morning is important. During my Princess Election, Erica gained votes by doing just that."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1597.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Smiling "That brings back memories. At that time, I was just desperate; I didn't even think about the meaning of handing out flyers."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1598.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Nervous smile "Now that you mention it, it might be thanks to those flyers that I smoothly memorized all the students’ faces and names."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1119.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "It's the same with street speeches—you have to let people know you. If they don't know you, they won't even consider you as an option."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1120.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Winking "So come on, Heiwado sisters, let's do our best! <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> If Erika takes the throne, you ‘Knights’ will be able to soak up the sweet rewards to your heart's content."]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0039")
    MSG([[ 【Ione Heiwado・Jasuko Heiwado】 "R-really?"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1121.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Smiling "I'm serious. It'll be like an all-you-can-drink bar of sweet rewards."]])

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0036.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ione Heiwado】 "Ah, an all-you-can-drink bar of sweet rewards… such a sweet-sounding phrase…"]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0032.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Jasuko Heiwado】 "I'll hand out as many flyers or bills as it takes! We'll push our big sis Erika up to Princess!"]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-800,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑・汗）
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1122.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Nervous smile/sweat "Such simple-minded people. I hope they never betray us."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1599.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Nervous smile/sweat "They're pretty loyal to obligations and feelings, so they should be fine. Probably."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Honestly, I was not confident.]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0395.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Serious "Hyuahhhhhhh!!! I'll finish handing out flyers in Berserker Mode!"]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（真剣）×３
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,200,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,200,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    HIYU_PARTICLE_02(150, -60, 200, 60, 200, 70, 5, 500)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0396.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Serious "By distributing flyers at three times the normal speed, ten times the spin, and ten times the volume of voice! A flyer-distributing power that surpasses Lira-san by 3000!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    RESET_HIYU_PARTICLE(150)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（通常）、モブ女子生徒
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1123.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "Ignore the fool raging over there. Once we finish handing out our share, we'll head back to class. We still have to hold our morning strategy meeting today."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ --- On another day in the auditorium.]])

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    -- //BU：ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The seats were filled with ‘Himegami faction’ students, and Daria stood on the stage.]])

    MSG([[ Although the students of the ‘Himegami faction’ didn’t know what was about to happen, sensing the tense atmosphere, they were uneasy.]])

    MSG([[ And then that unease became reality.]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0451.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Serious "The reason I gathered you today is nothing less. As one of the 'Princesses' of this academy, there is something I must tell everyone."]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0452.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Serious "I have decided to support Erika-kun instead of Hermes in the next Princess Election. In other words, I have chosen to become Erika-kun’s ‘Knight’ rather than Hermes’s."]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0453.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Serious "It may be a tough decision... but if you will, fight alongside Erika-kun and me against the 'Coed faction'."]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    MSG([[ The formal declaration of switching to the Erika faction.]])

    MSG([[ Although she had subtly hinted at it in recent days, this was the first time she made it explicit. Naturally, the auditorium erupted into chaos.]])

    STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ・Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("3rd-short-hair_0001.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Short-haired 3rd year】 "P-please take that back! I don’t want to see Lady Daria oppose Lady Hermes!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("3rd-semilong_0001.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Semi-long-haired 3rd year】 "Exactly! The Himegami sisters are the most precious couple in this world!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("3rd-longhair_0001.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Long-haired 3rd year】 "I support Eldari. I have an Eridari trigger."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ It seemed that the ‘Knights’ were especially worried about a clash between Hermes and Daria.]])

    MSG([[ Those who supported the ‘Himegami sisters’ could not accept the idea of conflict between them.]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（苦笑・汗）、リラ（驚き）、ヒユ（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ We from the Erika faction, watching from the entrance of the auditorium, could not hide our surprise at the turmoil exceeding our expectations.]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0397.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Panicked "Hyuahhh... this is such a huge mess..."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1600.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "Sh-should I step forward and explain?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0446.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran】Nervous smile/sweat "Unfortunately, even if Erika steps out now, she would only be heckled by those who are not convinced."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1124.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Nervous smile/sweat "Uran-senpai is right. Well then, leave this operation to me, the one who suggested it."]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    -- //BU：ウラン（苦笑・汗）、ヒユ（焦り）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
WAIT(800)
STOP_SE("SEa015.wav")
    MSG([[ Saying that, Lira ran to the stage, standing beside Daria.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    -- //BU：ダリア（驚き）、リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav",1000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0454.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Surprised "L-Lira. What do you intend by coming all the way up here?"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1125.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Winking "Leave this to me. I’ll silence all those noisy students smartly."]])

    MSG([[ Holding back the worried Daria, Lira stood right in front of the stage.]])

    MSG([[ Then with a radiant smile, she declared loudly—]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG024aa")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_POSITION(200,0,0)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_SCALE(201,150,150)
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,265)
    SET_CUTIN_07_XL(35, 60, 35, 500, true)
    RIR_PARTICLE_02(202, "BUL_RIR07ea", 265, 300)
    RIR_PARTICLE_01(250, 0, 0, 100, 150)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1126.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Smiling "Quiet down! You weeds!!"]])

    RESET_CUTIN_07_02(60, 200)
    RESET_RIR_PARTICLE(201, 250)

    -- //SE：なし
STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",500)
    -- //それまで騒がしかったざわめきが消える。

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0455.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Surprised "Ugh..."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RYU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" ,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0447.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran】Panicked "Ugh..."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0398.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Panicked "Ugh..."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1601.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Panicked "That’s brute forceーーーーーーーーーーー!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Lira’s signature move—the unconscious compulsion to obey her words, ‘<r=リライティング>My Superior's Orders</r>’—exploded.]])

    MSG([[ Although it was not a very smart persuasion, the students who had been loud fell completely silent.]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- //BG：ステージ上
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ Scanning the quiet auditorium, Lira continued her words.]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1127.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Serious "What are you all making such a fuss about? Telling Senior Daria to reconsider... who do you think you are?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1128.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Serious "Senior Daria wouldn’t choose to support Erika without serious thought. If you are ‘Knights,’ trust your ‘Princess’s’ choice!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1129.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "At Yuriai Private Academy, it's the rule to entrust your will to one of the four ‘Princesses.’ What you should do isn’t persuade a ‘Princess’—it’s to make your choice."]])

    MSG([[ Everyone in the venue listened quietly to Lira’s words.]])

    MSG([[ Not because they were ‘ordered.’ Not because they were threatened.]])

    MSG([[ Purely, her words resonated with them.]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1130.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "Of course, neither Erika nor Senior Daria, nor Senior Hermes will ever force their choice on anyone."]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1131.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "Whether to uphold the academy’s tradition or support coeducation. We ‘Knights’ must decide for ourselves. That’s our battle, different from the Princess Election."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1132.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Winking "Let’s see it through properly. Our battle—our fight."]])

    -- //SE：拍手（小）
PLAY_SE("SEa020.wav")

    MSG([[ As Lira finished speaking, applause began somewhere—]])

    -- //SE：拍手（中）
PLAY_SE("SEa021.wav")

    -- //SE：拍手（大）
PLAY_SE("SEa019.wav")

    MSG([[ And that applause spread through the whole venue, becoming grand.]])

    MSG([[ Amazing. Lira alone had calmed a scene that had been so chaotic.]])

    MSG([[ Her influence was now absolutely on par with the other ‘Princesses.’ Once again, I thought she was an incredible person.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1133.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Panicked "W-wait, what’s with this applause!? I didn’t say anything special, okay? I only said what’s obvious!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1134.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Sad "Ahhh! Stop it, I’m embarrassed! Erika! You come out here too and stop this applause!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    -- //BU：ヒユ（笑顔）、ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
